wikipedia_page.main: Lee Martyn Rogers (born 8 April 1967) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Bristol City, Hereford United, York City and Exeter City, and in non-League football for Gloucester City.

response: * Lee Rogers (American singer) "I Want You To Have Everything" 1965, "Sex Appeal" 1968

* Lee Rogers (podiatrist) (born 1978), American podiatrist and politician
* Lee Rogers (racing driver) (born 1972), British racing driver
* Lee Rogers (novelist), American pseudonym used by Robert "Bob" Rogers
* Lee Rogers (footballer, born 1967), English footballer (Bristol City, Hereford United, York City, Exeter City)
